data.text: Ala naxa, “N kedenna nan yi manpa bogine yibodonma manpa ige badeni
Bayo gbeeɲɔxɔ lɔxɔna fe yi n bɔɲɛni.
N yi yamanane yibodon n ma xɔlɔni,
N na Alatala hinan wanle rabirama nɛn muxune ma,
Bayo, a bata yi a fala, a naxa,
E tɔrɔne birin yi a fan tɔrɔ,
Nayi, waxati danguxine fe yi rabira a yamaan ma, Musaa waxatina,
Naxan a yii sɛnbɛmaan makɛnɛn Musa xa,
Nde yi tixi e yɛɛ ra dangu tilinna xɔnna ma?
Alatalaa Nii Sariɲanxin yi e xali matabuni
Ala, i yɛɛ masa nxu ma keli kore,
Anu, i tan nan nxu fafe ra!
Yamanan findixi nɛn i ya yama sariɲanxin gbeen na waxatidi tun,
